We are using property configurator, and need to be able to refresh 
log4j.properties while our app is running w/out restarting. 
As such we call resetConfig, and config (URL)
Under AIX, we noticed that we can't edit log4j.properties once log4j starts up- 
file stays in use. I successfully patched it by calling
InputStream.close() inside property configurator.

in doConfigure(URL, repository)
there is
props.load(configURL.openStream)

I added
InputStream io = configURL.openStream();
props.load(io);
io.close(); (in try catch)


email if you have any questions.
